s: .dynamicAdvertContainer{position:absolute;border:1px solid #000;box-sizing:border-box;line-height:1;overflow:hidden;width:300px;height:600px;cursor:pointer;transform:translateZ(0)} @font-face{font-family:Avenir; src: url('./fonts/Avenir/Avenir-Book.woff') format('woff');} @font-face{font-family: BemboStd; src: url('./fonts/BemboStd/BemboStd.woff') format('woff');}
